DOC.detailed_description: Pfizer announce October 2007 would stop marketing Exubera . Nektar , company Pfizer license Exubera , announce April 9 , 2008 stop search new marketing partner . Accordingly , commercial availability Exubera . As result , study A2171029 terminate June 9 , 2008 . Neither safety efficacy reason cause study termination .
